title: Widdop37
author: Widdop37
content: It seems like many crypto investors that are looking forward to play to earn games like illuvium or Decimated want something like a ready player one vibe, do you think this is possible in crypto space? To me it looks like something that will never be possible in the next ten years and also many play to earn games will be abandoned in the end.

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: Not even need a ten years, now only around 2 years there's no more P2E games hype anymore, while I still remember how the crowd and hype about Axie Infinity on the late 2020. The same happen like ICO, IDO, IEO, CEFI, DEFI and so on, it's get abandoned when everyone realize the hype already end. I'd say on 2023 or 2024 there's no one will discuss about P2E again except for nostalgia.

comments.author: Maus0728
comments.body: That's not going to happen especially if you look at the current play to earn games economy and how poor their gameplay was which are unsustainable in the long run.On my radar, Axie is the only NFT that is still generating some noise online, and yet their playerbase continues to decline as a result of the token inflation issue that has not been rectified and the band-aid fixes they have previously implemented in the past. Don't get me wrong, because I am still an AXS holder and owned a handful of teams of axies which until today I didn't sold. And yeah, I'm still holding out some tiny bit of hope that Axie will eventually make a full recovery.

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: The crypto space is evolving fast and probably the fastest in all of the industries. Ten years is quite long and a lot could happen by then. Metaverse projects may takeover in the next five years and who knows if more ambitious developers would take on the challenge after that.

comments.author: yurez
comments.body: Quote from: Widdop37 on August 07, 2022, 09:08:30 AMIt seems like many crypto investors that are looking forward to play to earn games like illuvium or Decimated want something like a ready player one vibe, do you think this is possible in crypto space? To me it looks like something that will never be possible in the next ten years and also many play to earn games will be abandoned in the end.P2E games keep popping up and it looks like they will be popular for a long time to come. I think this niche is still young and so it might be good to keep an eye on these projects as they might be useful in the long run. Of course, real gamers are more concerned about the game's story and graphics and therefore P2E games with excellent graphics and a great story will be promising.
